content:
System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration Namespace

Definition

Provides classes that represent sections of the configuration file.

In this Article

Classes

ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration

Represents the section in the configuration file that addresses the role class. This class cannot be inherited.
